snippet: A healthy debate has been sparked by the country’s president, who suggested Germany play a bigger role in international affairs, even if that means using the army.
abstract: Editorial praises German Pres Joachim Gauck for saying at the Munich Security Conference that his country should take more responsibility for shaping international affairs; holds it is time for Germans to step up when the West helps people threatened by genocide, ethnic cleansing or crimes against humanity.
lead_paragraph: A healthy debate has been sparked by the country’s president, who suggested Germany play a bigger role in international affairs, even if that means using the army.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
